page.title: 06Life in Draycott
page.content:
My name is Victoria Salt and I am 11 years old. I am a resident of Draycott village. Draycott is a small, close-knit village. It has 2 pubs, a church, a post office, a grocery shop, a spots centre and a school.
In the summer holidays the only thing in Draycott which children can do is to go to the sports centre, if you are a member or if you have a friend who will take you as a guest. I think Draycott could improve by having more activities for children and some social club for adults.
I am quite satisfied living in Draycott and I wouldn't want to move.
